trans-unit.source: Specifies the database key of the supplier invoice.

seg-source.mrk: Specifies the database key of the supplier invoice.

target.mrk: 指定供应商发票的数据库代码。

trans-unit.source: When the <pname conkeyref="loio163a8772470142f8a27da3efe8c859f2/S4H-OP"/> system creates the supplier invoice, the database key (<sap-technical-name>DBkey</sap-technical-name>) is generated automatically. The database key identifies a supplier invoice and is part of the invoice URL.

seg-source.mrk: When the <pname conkeyref="loio163a8772470142f8a27da3efe8c859f2/S4H-OP"/> system creates the supplier invoice, the database key (<sap-technical-name>DBkey</sap-technical-name>) is generated automatically.
The database key identifies a supplier invoice and is part of the invoice URL.

target.mrk: 当 <pname conkeyref="loio163a8772470142f8a27da3efe8c859f2/S4H-OP"/> 系统创建供应商发票时，自动生成数据库代码 (<sap-technical-name>DBkey</sap-technical-name>)。
数据库代码标识供应商发票，并且是发票 URL 的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Starting from the <uicontrol>Supplier Invoices List</uicontrol> app, you can navigate into the supplier invoice to get the <sap-technical-name>DBkey</sap-technical-name> value in the URL. If you compare the URL value with the <uicontrol>Supplier Invoice Draft</uicontrol> value, you can check whether the uploaded file and the supplier invoice belong together.

seg-source.mrk: Starting from the <uicontrol>Supplier Invoices List</uicontrol> app, you can navigate into the supplier invoice to get the <sap-technical-name>DBkey</sap-technical-name> value in the URL.
If you compare the URL value with the <uicontrol>Supplier Invoice Draft</uicontrol> value, you can check whether the uploaded file and the supplier invoice belong together.

target.mrk: 从<uicontrol>供应商发票清单</uicontrol>应用开始，可以导航到供应商发票以获取 URL 中的 <sap-technical-name>DBkey</sap-technical-name> 值。
如果将 URL 值和<uicontrol>供应商发票草稿</uicontrol>值作比较，则可检查上载的文件和供应商发票是否属于同一类。
